sentence.Network_en: The greater ornamentation, however, is reserved for entablature.
sentence.Network_cn: 更大的纹饰, 不过, 是保留给口.

sentence.Network_en: Entablature: Assemblage of horizontal moldings and Bands supported by the columns of Classical Buildings.
sentence.Network_cn: 檐部: 古典建筑中紧接柱子之上,非古典建筑中紧接类似支承体之上,由横向线脚或横带组成的部分.

sentence.Network_en: A standing or kneeling figure of a man used as a supporting column for an entablature.
sentence.Network_cn: 男像柱饰有站立或跪着的男像,用作上横梁的支撑柱子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... enswathement 包扎 entablature 台口 entablement 像座.
...粗糙，柱础是方形的，柱额有两个简单的云卷。柱额，是我按汉语生造的词，指柱子上的额头，专业书将其称为“柱上楣构（entablature）”。这“楣构”上的云卷，严格说是“卷涡”，不一定是云。柱身中间圆圆鼓鼓，不高，矮墩墩的挺着肚腩。现在.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (formerly also as intablature): from Italian intavolatura 'boarding' (partly via French entablement 'entablement'), from intavolare 'board up' (based on tavola 'table')

means.word_mean: 1. (architecture) the structure consisting of the part of a classical temple above the columns between a capital and the roof
